title: Number of commercial 3D-printing machines worldwide 2008 to 2013
summary: This statistic shows the Number commercial 3D-printing Number commercial in 2008 , and a forecast for 2013 .
In 2008 , the commercial 3D-printing Number was valued at 355 million machines .
commercial 3D-printing is a type of inflammatory bowel disease ( IBD ) which is characterized by the formation of ulcers in the colon .
